teaser: A true orange classic. Perfect for your summer. Easy and quick, fresh and fruity.
title: Screw Driver

recipe.recipe1: Find a suitable glass. Typically served in a coupe glass.
recipe.recipe3: Add vodka to glass with ice cubes.
recipe.recipe5: Done. Simple as that. Enjoy it.

body: A Screwdriver is the classic Vodka Juice that we all know and love. A Screwdriver is incredibly simple to make and can easily be enjoyed even if you are not too fond of vodka, as the juice goes away and hides the strong traces of alcohol in the drink. The drink has also been named by The International Bartenders Association as one of their official cocktails.

teaser: Perfect for a warm summer day. Grape, refreshing and well-tasting.
title: Nordic Pamola

recipe.recipe1: Fill a highball glass with ice.
recipe.recipe3: Now fill it with the delicius grape soda.
recipe.recipe4: Decorate with a sliced grape. Enjoy.

body: Nordic Pamola is our take on the classic grape drink, but with our delicious FROST aquavit instead of tequila. The drink offers both sweet and bitter flavors, including from the pink grape soda. Enjoy this cocktail all year round.

teaser: James Bond's favorite drink. A tart and refreshing drink that should be enjoyed ice cold. Shaken, not stirred.
title: Vodka Martini

recipe.recipe1: Find your best Martini glass, cool it in the freezer for a better experience.
recipe.recipe2: Fill it with plenty of ice.
recipe.recipe3: Pour the ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake it for around 10 sec.
recipe.recipe4: Pour out the ice from the glass and strain it over the cooled glass.
recipe.recipe5: Decorate with olives or lemon zest and enjoy.

body: Iconic, classic, and refreshing - with our own twist. James Bond's go-to. Shaken, not stirred. A super simple cocktail that is elegant and has a razor-sharp balance between the ingredients, where our quality vodka really shines.

third.title: lemon zest or olives for decorations

teaser: An invigorating, tart, and refreshing drink that should be enjoyed ice cold. Perfect for the coffee lover.
title: Espresso Martini

recipe.recipe2: Fill the shaker with vodka and coffee liqueur. Add cold espresso.
recipe.recipe3: Fill the shaker with ice and shake well
recipe.recipe4: Serve the drink in a chilled glass.
recipe.recipe5: Gently place the coffee beans on the foam.

body: For the coffee-loving cocktail enthusiast. A full-bodied drink, full of flavor and with silky foam on top. You rarely go wrong when serving espresso martini.

teaser: A refreshing ginger drink. Combines the freshness of lime with the strong notes of ginger.
title: Kiev Mule

recipe.recipe1: Find a suitable glass. Typically served in a copper mug, but a lowball will also do just fine.
recipe.recipe2: Fill the glass with crushed ice.
recipe.recipe3: Pour lime juice and vodka over the ice.

body: A well-known classic, but damn good nonetheless. A cocktail that suits most occasions and which, with its refreshing notes of lime, is perfect on a warm summer evening.

teaser: The creamy classic. A well-rounded taste and perfect for a cold winter's day.
title: White Russian

recipe.recipe2: Pour all ingredients in a shaker and fill it with ice.
recipe.recipe4: Strain the drink over the glass.

body: A creamy and rich drink. An obvious choice to serve in the winter months. This cocktail is the perfect combination of bitterness from the coffee and sweetness from the whole milk or cream, giving a round pleasant taste.

teaser: A refreshing hot ginger classic with a twist. Perfect for warm evenings and summer days in the garden.
title: Stormy Bornholmer

recipe.recipe2: Pour the Sevablødda in the glass.
recipe.recipe3: Fill it with delicious Ginger Beer
recipe.recipe4: Press some lime juice in the glass.
recipe.recipe5: Decorate with a slice of lime.

body: As the name suggests, perfect for those late summer evenings or dark late nights. A cozy and relaxing cocktail that gives a warm touch from the ginger. A true classic, with a little traditional Bornholm twist - that definitely makes it better. It is fresh, spicy and can be enjoyed on both rainy or sunny days

teaser: Foamy, creamy and sour classic with a traditional Danish twist.
title: Akva Sour

recipe.recipe2: Shake well and fill the glass with ice.
recipe.recipe4: Decorate the cocktail with a slice of dehydrated lemon

body: Foamy, creamy and sour classic with a traditional Danish twist in the form of our traditional Bornholm Clear Akvavit. Can be enjoyed all year round, and is perfect for almost any occasion. Simple comfort that hits really well after dinner or for dessert, because of its sweet taste.

teaser: Foamy, creamy and sour classic with a traditional Danish twist.
title: FROST Akva Sour

recipe.recipe2: Shake well and fill the glass with ice.
recipe.recipe4: Decorate the cocktail with a slice of dehydrated lemon

body: Foamy, creamy and sour classic with a traditional Danish twist in the form of our traditional FROST Akvavit. Can be enjoyed all year round, and is perfect for almost any occasion. Simple comfort that hits really well after dinner or for dessert, because of its sweet taste.

teaser: A classic with a Danish twist. Spicy, bitter, sweet and refreshing.
title: Nordic Negroni

recipe.recipe3: Stir a few times with a spoon..

body: The mixture of our traditional Bornholmer Akvavit, sweet vermouth and Campari orange gives the cocktail a sweet, bitter and refreshing taste that is perfect for a cozy evening - or simply an evening where the hips are a little loose. Popular classic with a local Bornholm twist that takes it to new heights.

teaser: Everyone knows it. Everyone likes it. With a Nordic twist.
title: Nordic Mojito

recipe.recipe2: Put the limewedges and sugarsyrup in the glass and mash them with a muddler.
recipe.recipe3: Smash the mint leaves between your hands, put them in the glass and mash a little more.
recipe.recipe4: Add Akvavit and crushed ice in the glass.
recipe.recipe5: Top it with sparkling water and garnish with mint leaves.

body: The mouth-watering, fresh and sweet cocktail. We've spiced it up a bit and replaced the pale rum with our refreshing FROST Akvavit. Try it before your neighbor..

teaser: En favorit for mange, med vores take.
title: Sea Buckthorn G&T

recipe.recipe1: Fill a coupe glass with plenty of ice.
recipe.recipe2: Pour all the ingredients in the glass.
recipe.recipe3: Garnish with frozen sea buckthorn berries.

body: The best of both worlds. The fresh cocktail is a result of sour flavors from the sea buckthorn combined with the bitter tonic and is a real winner. The cocktail gets its beautiful color from the orange-yellow berries and decorates any table.

teaser: An elegant and refreshing champagne cocktail to treat you and your guests.
title: Champagne Fizz

recipe.recipe1: Pour sugar, lemon juice, gin and egg whites into a shaker with lots of ice.
recipe.recipe3: Strain the cocktail over a tall champagne glass.

body: The elegant, flavorful cocktail is good for most occasions. The cocktail has the perfect combination of sweetness, freshness and a bit of bitterness, which makes it a true star cocktail.

teaser: Refreshing lime-taste with a twist. The Mojito comes in many variations - here is ours.
title: Gin Mojito

recipe.recipe1: Fill a coupe glass with lots of ice.
recipe.recipe2: Strike the mint leaves between your hands a few times.
recipe.recipe3: Pour syrup and gin into the glass.

body: A classic in new clothes. A refreshing and (dangerously) mouthwatering cocktail that is always a hit. Replace the rum with our delicious gin with sweet notes and serve a sure winner for your guests.

teaser: Perfect for a hot summer day. Our beloved G&T in a frozen version.
title: Frozen Sea Buckthorn G&T

recipe.recipe1: Mix the gin, tonic and lime juice in a frost-proof container.
recipe.recipe2: Freeze the liquid until it forms a solid mass.
recipe.recipe3: Break the frozen G&T into smaller pieces.
recipe.recipe4: Put them in a blender and blend until the frozen mass has turned into smaller crystals.
recipe.recipe5: Pour your cocktail into a coupe glass and top with sea buckthorn juice.
recipe.recipe6: Garnish with a sprig of burning rosemary and enjoy.

body: Our frozen G&T is always a hit on a hot summer day. When the heat wave is upon us, there's no better way to cool down than with this cocktail in hand and a few good friends.

teaser: Bittersweet, herbaceous flavor with a bold, refreshing taste. It is a sophisticated cocktail with a unique flavor profile
title: Weekend Negroni

recipe.recipe2: Pour all ingredients over the ice.

body: Hard work week? Enjoy the iconic Italian drink and relax, it's the weekend. The bitter notes from the Campari are combined with the sweetness of our fantastic gin. Try it!

teaser: Fly in the seventh heaven with this brilliant flyver drink. A Danish classic.
title: Flyver Sjus

recipe.recipe2: Pour all ingredients over the ice.

body: When you need to fly high, this is your go-to cocktail. It's easy to make and just as easy to drink. Perfect for many guests, so you don't have to spend your entire evening in the kitchen.

teaser: A fruity and refreshing version of the classic G&T. We promise you won't be disappointed.
title: Fruity G&T

recipe.recipe4: Garnish with a handful of frozen sea buckthorn berries and a mint leaf.

body: A fruity and refreshing cocktail. A twist on the classic G&T, where you end up with a result that is best enjoyed on a late summer day in good company.

teaser: Notes of sea buckthorn, dill, and cucumber are the perfect addition to any party. Delight disguised in a cocktail.
title: Yellow Heaven

liqour.title: Sea Buckthorn, dill and cucumber snaps

recipe.recipe1: Fill a tall glass with ice.
recipe.recipe2: Pour the shot over the ice.
recipe.recipe4: Garnish with a slice of cucumber.

body: Yes, snaps can actually be used in cocktails, and it tastes great. This fresh cocktail with notes of sea buckthorn, dill, and cucumber is the perfect addition to any party.

liqour.title: Sea Buckthorn, dill and cucumber snaps
